phrase.item: ‎‎You are the rushing sound of your mother's waterfall.
‎‎You are the rain in your mother's sky.
‎‎You are the grapes in your mother's garden, you are the light in your mother's eye.
My little son is a distant river, my little son is the rushing sound of a waterfall, my little son is the splashing of a water-channel.
My little son is a rainy sky, my little son a mountain eagle, my little son is the garden grapes.
My little son is in Bajin, he has traveled Chin [China] and Mochin. His [belongings] are in his saddlebag.
My son is in Quqan, in Quqan he has a child, he does not need his homeland of Wukh [Wakhan].
